com.lmax.api

Interface SessionDisconnectedListener


  • public interface SessionDisconnectedListener
    Listener interface for notification that your session has been disconnected. This may happen because the session has timed out, your account has been locked, etc. Timeouts can be avoided by sending heartbeat requests every 5 minutes or so.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifySessionDisconnected()
      Called if the session has been disconnected.

    • Method Detail

      • notifySessionDisconnected

        void notifySessionDisconnected()
        Called if the session has been disconnected. The session can no longer be used. In order to continue, a new session must be created by logging in again.
